comment: Lindsey G. displaying DGAF. The man is taking T supplements. Or McCain is no longer doing him in the ass. Or something. At any rate, it's kind of amazing
amr:
# ::snt Lindsey G. displaying DGAF. The man is taking T supplements. Or McCain is no longer doing him in the ass. Or something. At any rate, it's kind of amazing
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / display-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Lindsey"
                        :op2 "G."))
            :ARG1 (p2 / publication
                  :name (n2 / name

      :snt2 (t / take-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / man)
            :ARG1 (s / supplement
                  :mod (d2 / disease
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "T"))))
      :snt3 (o / or
            :op2 (d3 / do-02
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "McCain"))
                  :ARG1 (a / ass)
                  :ARG2 p
                  :time (n5 / no-longer))
            :op4 (s2 / something))
      :snt4 (a2 / amaze-01
            :ARG0 (ii / it)
            :degree (k / kind-of)
            :mod (r / rate
                  :mod (a3 / any))))

comment: Please consider how others will feel when reading these comments, and change your words.
